post.content:
Which developer Mediatonic has now denied.

Six months ago, Tumble Guys arrived on PlayStation 4 by technique of subscription provider PlayStation Plus. Since then, it has been a PlayStation console original, while also being on the market on PC.

Six months later, it now appears to be like a topic of if no longer when the breakout battle royale will advance to other console platforms, corresponding to Nintendo Change and Xbox. However when will it occur?

Around per week ago, fairly of light brandter between Tumble Guys’ cheeky Twitter and the official Xbox UK legend living tongues wagging that Tumble Guys would advance on Xbox Sport Fling sooner slightly than later.

Then, final evening, the Xbox Sport Fling Instagram legend spoke back to a person asking about Tumble Guys that “it is coming [suspicious eyes emoji]”.

This became picked up and shared as extra proof – till a excellent-searching clear denial became all today issued this afternoon from the Tumble Guys official legend:

Sorry – there has been fairly of a mixup – Tumble Guys is rarely any longer coming to Xbox Sport Fling!

— Tumble Guys ? Season 3.5 (@FallGuysGame) January 20, 2021

Did plans replace or did some wires rep crossed? Or, as we saw with Seize watch over, did a deal rep discussed a tiny bit too early – forcing the developer to then publicly express it?

Obviously, even though Tumble Guys is rarely any longer coming to Xbox Sport Fling, it doesn’t imply the sport received’t commence on other consoles altogether. At some point soon. Doubtlessly.
post.title: There’s confusion over whether Fall Guys will join Xbox Game Pass
